meaningMnemonic: You've got your <kanji>instruction</kanji> and you have your <kanji>practice</kanji>. Time to start your <vocabulary>training</vocabulary>, or simply your <vocabulary>practice</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
